author: cnbc.com
title: Flanigan's Declares Dividend
text:
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla., Feb. 26, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- FLANIGAN'S ENTERPRISES, INC., (NYSE AMERICAN: BDL) owners and operators of the "Flanigan's Seafood Bar and Grill" restaurants and "Big Daddy's" retail liquor stores, today announced that on February 23, 2018, the Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of 25 cents per share to shareholders of record on March 16, 2018, payable on March 30, 2018.
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/flanigans-declares-dividend-300604414.html
SOURCE Flanigan's Enterprises, Inc.
